Name: Mystic Tidecaller
Story Background: Hailing from the depths of the turbulent sea, the Mystic Tidecaller channels the ancient powers of the ocean to shape and control the ebb and flow of magic.
Ability: Flash, When Mystic Tidecaller enters the battlefield, you may return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Appearance Description: The Mystic Tidecaller appears as a majestic figure with flowing azure robes and hair resembling cresting waves, surrounded by an aura of shimmering water.
